<xen:select name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][display_position][member_cards]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value.display_position.member_cards}"> <xen:option value="0">{xen:phrase 3ps_usergroup_ranks_under_username}</xen:option> <xen:option value="1">{xen:phrase 3ps_usergroup_ranks_under_user_title}</xen:option> </xen:select> </xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:checkboxunit>

option.edit_format_params: 0=All available Usergroup Ranks 1=Usergroup Ranks user has

phrases.phrase: All of the user's user groups have a display style priority higher than
All of the user's user groups have a display style priority lower than
Usergroup Ranks powered by 3.studIo. The forum owner is a good person!
Please confirm that you want to delete the following usergroup rank
User's display user group has a display style priority higher than
User's display user group has a display style priority lower than
User's display user group is in the user's secondary usergroups
User's display user group is the user's primary usergroup
Display Usergroup Rank if User or Usergroup...
User's display user group is in any of the selected user groups
All of the user's secondary user group are in any of the selected user groups
Any of the user's secondary user group are in any of the selected user groups
User's display user group is NOT in any of the selected user groups
All of the user's secondary user group are NOT in any of the selected user groups
Any of the user's secondary user group are NOT in any of the selected user groups
User's primary user group is NOT in any of the selected user groups
User's primary user group is in any of the selected user groups
User's primary user group has a display style priority higher than
User's primary user group has a display style priority lower than
The provided file is not an Usergroup Ranks XML file.
Enter a description for this user group rank. This will be shown on the User Group Ranks Listing page on the Help pages.
Select this to disallow users from seeing this Usergroup Rank in the Usergroup Ranks listing. User groups with permission "Can see all ranks" are not affected.
CSS Classes that will be applied to this usergroup rank. White space to separate.

Image: An image for the rank. Wrapped with <img> tag.
Text: Plain text. You may use HTML.
Select this option to rebuild existing cache entries only. Faster than rebuilding all entries, so only uncheck this box unless you really want to rebuild the user/rank association for all users.
The requested Usergroup Rank is not found.
All of the user's secondary user groups have a display style priority higher than
Any of the user's secondary user groups have a display style priority higher than
All of the user's secondary user groups have a display style priority lower than
Any of the user's secondary user groups have a display style priority lower than
Use style attribute for rendering this sprite
Check this option to use the style attribute instead of the generated class for sprite rendering.

Select the caching level you would like to use for this addon. More aggressive caching will reduce queries needed and loading time, but will put more pressure on the system when you change a setting.

Level 1: Rank Definition and Display Style Priority caching (recommended for forums without caching mechanisms)
Level 2: Level 1 plus user rank association caching (recommended for forums with caching mechanisms)

Whether to display an one-line credit notice on your forum's footer, under the standard XenForo copyright notice.
Please support me by always keeping this box checked. This notice will not display the add-on version. It is fine if you uncheck this option off.

This add-on is released under the BSD 2-Clause modified License. While this option can be turned off, you may NOT remove the footer comment (invisible, separate from the credit notice) UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES except with written permission. Not obeying this instruction will be considered as violation of the software license and legal action will be taken.
Select the place the ranks should be shown.
Check this option to enable the Usergroup Ranks Listing page on the Help menu.
Toggle this option to activate/deactivate Usergroup Ranks display.

templates.template: {xen:helper renderrank, $userGroupRank}
